flawed_nl_solution:
He drinks 15 bottles every month and there are 12 months in 1 year so that's 15*12 = <<15*12=180>>180 bottles
He earns $0.1 on every bottle that he recycles so that's 0.1*180 = $<<0.1*180=81>>81
He has $81 and each bottle costs $3 so he can buy 81/3 = <<81/3=27>>27 bottles

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18.0, not 81.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
